Shadowcaster adimred this bot's spunk, but he knew she
seriously had no idea of who she was dealing with.

"Considering that I've been online since just before
the great uprising, I'd say it's safe to say I've
destroyed more installations and ruined more
operations than the number of cycles you've been
online. Besides, I thought you greatly revered we
ancient Decepticons?" the last part was said with a
real sneer.

 --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...>
wrote: 
---------------------------------
KitKat::

Her ears perked up at Shadowcaster. She turned her
head so he could 
hear her,"I've turned more bots into paperclips than
you've had hot 
meals bot."  She then looked at Blackfang, "See, a
pred at spark." 
with a mischievious grin.
